description.div: The Huayu general system consists of five generals of which four have been found so far. The fifth, the west-general will be visible after 2025 when a temple festival will be held at Qingming.

The Huayu North General is to the north of the three pagodas and on the west side of the path heading north. Begin located only a few meters from the path, it is however most of the year invisible, as the area is overgrown.
The structure of the North General of Huayu
